title: BlockType
description: The counter-party to "Support". This block offers supporting faces which can match the face requirements of adjacent/nearby blocks.

Group.description:
Sets the group for this block. Used by BlockSets.

A group of "@Tech" will prevent physics from being automatically applied to the block.
Group.markdownDescription:
Sets the group for this block. Used by **BlockSets**.

A group of _"@Tech"_ will prevent physics from being automatically applied to the block.

BlockListAssetId.description: The name of a BlockList asset, for use  in builder tool brushes
BlockListAssetId.markdownDescription: The name of a BlockList asset, for use  in builder tool brushes

PrefabListAssetId.description: The name of a PrefabList asset, for use  in builder tool brushes
PrefabListAssetId.markdownDescription: The name of a PrefabList asset, for use  in builder tool brushes

BlockBreakingDecalId.description: The block breaking decal defined here defines the decal asset that should be overlaid when this block is damaged
BlockBreakingDecalId.markdownDescription: The block breaking decal defined here defines the decal asset that should be overlaid when this block is damaged

BlockParticleSetId.description: The block particle set defined here defines which particles should be spawned when an entity interacts with this block (like when stepping on it for example
BlockParticleSetId.markdownDescription: The block particle set defined here defines which particles should be spawned when an entity interacts with this block (like when stepping on it for example

Particles.description: The particles defined here will be spawned on top of blocks of this type placed in the world.
Particles.markdownDescription: The particles defined here will be spawned on top of blocks of this type placed in the world.

Seats.description: The details of the seats on this block.
Seats.markdownDescription: The details of the seats on this block.

Beds.description: The details of the beds for this block.
Beds.markdownDescription: The details of the beds for this block.

InteractionHint.description: This property allows to specify custom text that will be displayed underneath the crosshair when the player aims at this block. The value of this property should be a reference to a translation. {key} will be replaced with the interaction input binding.
InteractionHint.markdownDescription: This property allows to specify custom text that will be displayed underneath the crosshair when the player aims at this block. The value of this property should be a reference to a translation. *{key}* will be replaced with the interaction input binding.

BlockSoundSetId.description: Sets the BlockSoundSet that will be used for this block for various events e.g. placement, breaking
BlockSoundSetId.markdownDescription: Sets the **BlockSoundSet** that will be used for this block for various events e.g. placement, breaking

AmbientSoundEventId.description: A looping ambient sound event that emits from this block when placed in the world or held in-hand.
AmbientSoundEventId.markdownDescription: A looping ambient sound event that emits from this block when placed in the world or held in-hand.

InteractionSoundEventId.description: A oneshot sound event that plays upon interaction with this block.
InteractionSoundEventId.markdownDescription: A oneshot sound event that plays upon interaction with this block.

Support.title: Merged map of BlockFace and MergedBlockFaces
Support.description:
A set of "Required Support" conditions. If met, the block won't fall off from block physics checks.
If this field is empty the block is automatically considered supported.
Support.markdownDescription:
A set of "Required Support" conditions. If met, the block won't fall off from block physics checks.
*If this field is empty the block is automatically considered supported.*

Supporting.title: Merged map of BlockFace and MergedBlockFaces

IgnoreSupportWhenPlaced.description: Whether when this block is placed by a player that the support requirements should be ignored.
IgnoreSupportWhenPlaced.markdownDescription: Whether when this block is placed by a player that the support requirements should be ignored.

Aliases.description: Specifies the alternatives names (aliases) for a block type for use in command matching
Aliases.markdownDescription: Specifies the alternatives names (aliases) for a block type for use in command matching
